item.title: The Roomba Series - How to create an autonomous mobile robot
item.description: Maybe too much time I found an outdated Roomba 581 vacuum robot in the attic. I just couldnâ€™t throw it away, so I decided to pimp it a little. A new hobby project was born! After all, the Roomba hardware is a good vacuum, and it offers a serial interface to read sensors and control the actuators. Only the robot brain and navigation systems are really outdated. I decided to give it a new brain with better navigation hardware, and reuse the Roomba platform as a whole.
